title: Pamela Anderson
summary: Pamela Denise Anderson (born July 1, 1967[2][3][4]) is a Canadian-American actress, model, television personality, author, and activist. She is known for her numerous appearances in Playboy magazine and for her work on the television series Home Improvement (1991–1993, 1997), Baywatch (1992–1997), and V.I.P. (1998–2002).
